jobs.title: Senior Security Engineer
responsibilities: Lead security assessments for enterprise clients, including vulnerability scanning, penetration testing, and security architecture reviews.
Designed and implemented a security operations center (SOC) that reduced incident response time by 60%.
Developed automated security tools and scripts to enhance the efficiency of routine security tasks.
Conducted security awareness training for over 500 employees, resulting in a 75% reduction in successful phishing attempts.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate security controls into the development lifecycle.

jobs.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
responsibilities: Performed daily security monitoring and incident response activities.
Conducted vulnerability assessments and provided remediation recommendations.
Implemented and managed security tools, including SIEM, IDS/IPS, and endpoint protection solutions.
Developed security policies and procedures in compliance with industry standards (NIST, ISO 27001).
Created detailed reports and dashboards to communicate security posture to executive management.

jobs.title: IT Security Specialist
responsibilities: Managed network security infrastructure, including firewalls, VPNs, and access control systems.
Conducted security assessments and audits to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
Responded to security incidents and performed root cause analysis.
Implemented multi-factor authentication across all company systems.
Collaborated with IT teams to ensure security best practices were followed.
